entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
